title: The Village - Widescreen  (MKV)
description:
PG-13 | 1h 48min | Drama, Mystery | July 30th 2004





A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.



Director: M. Night Shyamalan

Writer: M. Night Shyamalan

Stars: Sigourney Weaver, William Hurt, Joaquin Phoenix




Deleted Scenes Introduced By M. Night Shyamalan
Bryce's Diary
M. Night's Home Movie
and More


English & French audio with English, French and Spanish subtitles.

Bonus Material has English audio only.

Widescreen 1.85:1 Enhanced for 16 x 9 Televisions

NTSC-1
